post.body: You are talking about the baby in your avatar photo? Took me awhile to figure out what you were talking about. LOL
You've probably already seen this, but I think it's the Flagstaff paper online: http://www.azdailysun.com/hotjobs/
fun game on Twitter - every day somebody new gets picked, and everybody just tweets their handle, blows 'em away! lots follow.
Yeah - good name for something ... not sure what it would be, but darned good name. oh, idea ... will DM you
You've got over 1700 followers ... only 100 bombs so far?
TweetLure ... new word or application I'm not aware of yet?
Been there, done that. LOL Like that "duh factor" phrase. Love your logo!!!
and WHY would they think THAT? LOL hey, who do you know in Flagstaff? @CrypticFragment is in need of a job there.
your link took me to my dashboard - you will need to send url of lens outside of your dashboard.
Maybe set an intention and watch for synchronous events - one thing in my favor, I have the time available.
That's what I'm thinking. Now I'm wanting to go to Boise for bootcamp; no clue why, just want to go. thinking experiment!
Also had woman with mental illness, couldn't throw anything away, nobody knew until blight patrol knocked on door for weeds.
anger @ 4closure, pour oil on rugs, knock things over, kick holes in walls. that was long time creating, accumulating=Sickness
I can't imagine anybody doing this on purpose - there must be an underlying illness. Deliberate is done fast, this accumulated
Any minute - waiting on the call from the tire place. shutting down cable modem in final prep. now. Tweet ya later!
And mega congrats on the overall award, too! "The 2nd RUNNER-UP of Giant Squid of the Year is Chefkeem."
Hey! CONGRATULATIONS!!! I just saw you won the best Giant Squid lensography!!!
I just saw you won a giant squid award!!! Hurray YOU!!!
It's nice weather everywhere but here, it seems. The storm ends 80 miles south ... if we can only GET STARTED!
Will you be listening today? We MIGHT get on the road soon! The tire guy just got here!
Yeah, me too ... I hope we actually get on the road today. My daughter isn't taking the delay well at all.
If we EVER get OUT of here, that is. **grin** My guardian angels have been busy - but today should be THE DAY we leave.
Thank you! I have high hopes for 2009 and Austin.
Yay! Congratulations!
I think I'll pass on following him/her - but thanks for the heads up.
Define "addiction" LOL
OK, I really MUST log off and do some packing. T minus 7 days and counting. 12/26 we load the truck and start driving!
Wondering why the Tweetbomb is so much fun ... makes me feel like a little kid, giggling and feeling giddy. Peculiar reaction; wonder why?
TWEETBOMB! @stdroddy
RT: @SeanWoodruff Hey EVERYONE follow @BobBurg-let's see if we can lure him in here. U'll be glad U did. Let's push him to 500+ FAST-Pls RT
RT: @tweetbomb 4 minutes Til TWEETBOMB - Retweet, and tell your friends
Waiting for the TweetBomb before I log off and start packing ...
Fast twit from Chandler, AZ - staying another day to visit with @Project_man's grandkids. They are wonderful!
OK, third time's a charm - shutting down the cable to take back the modem and the cable box. Trailer should be ready any minute-Bye for now!
SQUIDOO: The WINNER of the Best Music lens is Crazy Funny Songs by Joan4. MOONVINE WINS!!!
Waiting for the tire guy - got to put new tires on the trailer. Blogged about the delay here: http://kleppin.blogspot.com/
OK, this is the last tweet before we pack the computers up. House is almost empty; time to shut down. Tweet ya'll from the streets!
wondering how long I can leave the table and the modem set up before I have to turn it off and fold 'em up for the last time.
Breathing hard after racing last boxes and things to big truck dodging raindrops. We might get out of here TODAY!!! Can hardly wait!
RT: @AnnaTarkov 1 best thing about Twitter is that it affords validation 2 those who haven't yet received it professionally or personally.
